title: Return of Dr. Nathaniel Ashford III
summary: Ashford unlocks the family practice at dawn, recommitting to the town after profound loss.

title: The South Restaurant blow-up
summary: Group dinner implodes; Davia escorts Hadley out; Julia’s cruel line triggers the ejection.

title: First kiss — Levi & Davia (after close)
summary: Slow dance in the diner; the line finally crossed.

title: Brass ring discovered in Wightman drawer
summary: Linen envelope yields a brass ring with a hairline notch; not listed in probate.
